meanings: restore the Turtle Ship to its original size
restore artifacts[remains] based on thorough historical research

vlive.korean: 더 선명하게 복원해봐. Make it show more clearly. 듣기 View video 아이엠 (I am) : <사랑, 기억에 머물다> 6-2화 (Final) [해피 엔딩]
6년 만에 복원해 놓은 거래. "But they renovated the buildings over six years". 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 여자친구가 사랑한 유럽 EP.07 Part.1
vlive.english: "But they renovated the buildings over six years".

vlive.korean: 1999년에 지금과 같은 모습으로 복원되었습니다. But it was restored to its original state in 1999. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 하늘에서 만난 대한민국 3부
vlive.english: But it was restored to its original state in 1999.

vlive.korean: 후손들이 나라를 지키는 마음을 가질 수 있도록 복원해놓았기 때문입니다. to educate our future generations about national defense. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 하늘에서 만난 대한민국 3부
vlive.english: to educate our future generations about national defense.

vlive.korean: 그래서 복원도 절대 안 되고요. The recovery can't be done. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 예니, 여름맞이 워터프루프 메이크업 Water Proof Makeup

examples.korean: The house has been lovingly restored. 발음듣기 그 집은 애정 어린 손길로 복원한 상태이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house has been lovingly restored. 발음

examples.korean: Her job is restoring old paintings. 발음듣기 그녀가 하는 일은 옛날 그림을 복원하는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her job is restoring old paintings. 발음

examples.english: to break off/establish/restore diplomatic relations with a country 발음

examples.korean: They have tried to reconstruct the settlement as it would have been in Iron Age times. 발음듣기 그들은 그 정착지를 철기 시대와 같은 모습으로 복원하려고 노력해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They have tried to reconstruct the settlement as it would have been in Iron Age times. 발음
